caseTitle: Pir Imran Sajid v. Managing Director/General Manager (Manager Finance) Telephone Industries of Pakistan & others
tagline: Telephone Industries of Pakistan (TIP) is wholly owned, controlled, managed and financed by the Federal Government. Therefore, TIP clearly falls within the definition of a "person" as envisaged by Article 199 of the Constitution. Vested right of regularization in service accrued in favour of contract employees working in TIP for the past more than 12 years.
